metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40982 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Information exposure through microarchitectural state after transientexecution in certain vector execution units for some Intel(R) Processorsmay allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
